---
name: Bug report
about: Create a report about a bug or issue in the mod.
title: ''
labels: bug
assignees: ''

---

### Bug Description
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

### Reproduction Steps
Steps to reproduce the behavior. If it is unknown how the bug occurred, this may be left out.

### Screenshots
Add screenshots or recordings to help us diagnose the problem. This may be left out, but it is strongly recommended to add something here.

### Additional Info
Any other additional info you want to add to the report.
